title: Large Times New Roman Family
content:
Hello --   
   
I am looking to purchase a really large family of Times New Roman, or Times --- a family with multiple weights, condensed, expert, and so on   
   
Anyone know which Foundry has something like this?
author: capital_m

comments.content: Linotype's Times Ten has the expert features, and Linotype has a pretty good assortment of Times faces.

It's worth asking what application(s) you'll be using. If Adobe apps, then you'll find an OpenType version with those extras built in easiest to use. If not, you'll want the extras available as separate fonts.   
   
Regards,   
   
T
